Name: Office No.41: Prototype Edition
About the game: WARNING: This is a prototype version of the first act of Office No.41. You'll get a free updated and completed first act if you buy the prototype Office No.41 is a first-persion atmospheric horror game GAMEPLAY: Experience an adventure horror gameplay. Solve puzzles, find secretes and don't get catched by the creatures of this abandoned place. Be ready to hide wherever you can. The puzzles you must solve can be very different. In some moments, be very attentive and use your brain. STORYLINE: 29th of November 2009 James Loderick goes to closed specialized music school '' Lim Donna '', in which he studied to find and take something that could make his dream come true. But right after he comes to school, he realizes that something is not alright. He needs to recollect all terrible things that happened to him in these places. Solve puzzles, listen to sounds, but do not forget - you are not alone. You never know what evil can stalk these places. You must hide or run, but find out the truth about abandoned corridors of '' Lim Donna ''. A horror adventure with a deep dark story awaits you there.
